data.text: @murffyslurtz This literally happens to me too. I just had blood work done since my last covid infection and my thyroid and potassium is way messed up which can cause tachycardia.

@murffyslurtz Hope you find stuff that helps and remember it never hurts to drink more water!
@crystallgnaires Oh yeah my roommate loves that stuff!
@crystallgnaires Thank you for all of this!! And yes they’re very tight 😭
